title: flutter doctor一直等待无响应.md
description:
#### flutter doctor 一直等待无响应的解决办法
- 打开flutter的安装目录/bin/cache/
- 删除lockfile文件
- 重启vscode

title: 页面传递参数.md
flutter mac下安装.md
description:
#### 参考资料
**https://ninghao.net/video/6364**  
**https://flutterchina.club/setup-macos/**

##### 启动命令：
>$ flutter create cjios  
>$ flutter emulator --launch apple_ios_simulator  
如果出现no device 首先要装an
